ingredient_list: Quantum foam extract;Stellar eggs;Nebula sugar;Dark matter cream
steps: Preheat quantum oven to 5000K|Whisk stellar eggs until fluffy|Fold in quantum foam extract carefully|Add nebula sugar and dark matter cream|Bake for 30 minutes at 5000K|Serve immediately

ingredient_list: Mars lettuce;Red dust tomatoes;Hydroponic cucumbers;Solar vinaigrette
steps: Wash all vegetables thoroughly|Chop mars lettuce and cucumbers|Slice red dust tomatoes|Toss with solar vinaigrette|Serve chilled
Boil neo-noodles for 5 minutes|Heat synth pork broth|Soft boil plasma eggs|Assemble noodles and broth|Top with plasma egg and glowing seaweed|Serve hot
Slice starfruit into spheres|Freeze cosmic berries with liquid nitrogen|Drizzle sweet nebula syrup over spheres|Serve immediately
Apply solar spice rub on photon steak|Heat ionized oil in pan|Sear steak for 20 minutes|Rest steak for 5 minutes|Serve hot
